name: PAC-RIO
description:
Recommended to adjust your sensitivity before playing.

If you face trouble adjusting slider: Press and hold ESC while adjusting the slider 

PAC-RIO 

3D Pacman mashup with Mario game elements!

Collect all the pallets to win!

Player Controls:

Move: W  Jump: SPACE

Pickup Item: E 

Use Item: F

Use Powerup: R
